article_title: Jon Stewart Blasts Rand Paul For Plagiarizing Wikipedia
article_text: Rand Paul has had a tough last few weeks as he's addressed charges of plagiarism, seemingly against his better nature. And Jon Stewart was not about to let him off the hook for copying from Wikipedia, of all places.

article_summary:
Rand Paul has had a tough last few weeks as he's addressed charges of plagiarism, seemingly against his better nature.
And Jon Stewart was not about to let him off the hook for copying from Wikipedia, of all places.
